name: carzula.com
overview:
Carzula.com is the first and largest search engine dedicated exclusively to used car shopping. The company searches and aggregates listings from across the web so you only need to search one site – Carzula.com.

Their mission is to deliver provide the most sophisticated, comprehensive and easy to use used car shopping experience on the web.

To accomplish this mission, carzula aggregates used car listings from across the web. Then we add a layer of advanced analytics, meta-data and personalization that significantly enhance the search experience, including our proprietary Carzula Value Score, category searches, local shopping guides, custom search preferences and personal shopping assistant alerts. All of this functionality is accessible through a simple, flexible search interface on traditional web and mobile browsers.
